PRFA 100.courseDesc: Provides practical experience as a participant in a Department of Performing Arts community arts initiative. Includes involvement with off campus activities with community members under faculty supervision and direction.
PRFA 100.courseDepartment: Antoinette Westphal College of Media Arts & Design
PRFA 100.repeatStatus: Can be repeated multiple times for credit
